mapper.select: select l.id as id, l.name as name, l.week_day as week_day, l.time_start as time_start, l.time_end as time_end, l.id_sport from intramurudes.league l
select id, name, week_day, time_start, time_end, id_sport from intramurudes.league where id = #{id}
select id, name, week_day, time_start, time_end, id_sport from intramurudes.league where id_sport = #{id_sport}
mapper.insert: insert into intramurudes.league(name, week_day, time_start, time_end, id_sport) values (#{league.name}, #{league.week_day}, #{league.time_start}, #{league.time_end}, #{league.id_sport});
